definition: unshakable or insistent especially in maintaining a position or opinion : unyielding
examples: an adamant insistence on doing things his own way
was adamant about making the change

definition: a stone (such as a diamond) formerly believed to be of impenetrable hardness
an unbreakable or extremely hard substance
examples: "Trust not in your gold and silver, trust not in your high fortresses; for, though the walls were of iron, and the fortresses of adamant, the Most High shall put terror into your hearts and weakness into your councils …"
